data.lyric:
[ti:Miss Americana]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Miss Americana & The Heartbreak Prince - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:04.03]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:08.07]Composed by：Taylor Swift/Joel Little
[00:12.11]You know I adore you I'm crazier for you than
[00:15.58]I was at sixteen lost in a film scene
[00:18.72]Waving homecoming queens marching band playing
[00:21.72]I'm lost in the lights
[00:25.01]American glory faded before me
[00:28.11]Now I'm feeling hopeless ripped up my prom dress
[00:31.60]Running through rose thorns
[00:33.15]I saw the scoreboard and ran for my life
[00:37.20]Ah
[00:39.34]No cameras catch my pageant smile
[00:42.51]I counted days I counted miles
[00:45.77]To see you there to see you there
[00:49.40]It's been a long time coming but
[00:51.83]It's you and me that's my whole world
[00:54.52]They whisper in the hallway "She's a bad bad girl"
[00:57.60]Okay
[00:58.25]The whole school is rolling fake dice
[01:00.89]You play stupid games you win stupid prizes
[01:04.55]It's you and me there's nothing like this
[01:07.55]Miss Americana and the Heartbreak Prince
[01:10.33]Okay
[01:10.98]We're so sad we paint the town blue
[01:13.94]Voted most likely to run away with you
[01:19.61]My team is losing battered and bruising
[01:22.78]I see the high fives between the bad guys
[01:25.99]Leave with my head hung
[01:27.54]You are the only one who seems to care
[01:32.28]American stories burning before me
[01:35.56]I'm feeling helpless the damsels are depressed
[01:38.60]"Boys will be boys" then where are the wise men
[01:41.87]Darling I'm scared
[01:44.31]Ah
[01:46.55]No cameras catch my muffled cries
[01:49.75]I counted days I counted miles
[01:52.95]To see you there to see you there
[01:56.60]And now the storm is coming but
[01:59.03]It's you and me that's my whole world
[02:01.68]They whisper in the hallway "She's a bad bad girl"
[02:04.77]Okay
[02:05.33]The whole school is rolling fake dice
[02:08.13]You play stupid games you win stupid prizes
[02:11.83]It's you and me there's nothing like this
[02:14.75]Miss Americana and the Heartbreak Prince
[02:17.58]Okay
[02:18.20]We're so sad we paint the town blue
[02:21.19]Voted most likely to run away with you
[02:29.59]And I don't want you to
[02:30.84]Go
[02:31.20]I don't really wanna
[02:32.44]Fight
[02:32.71]'Cause nobody's gonna
[02:33.96]Win
[02:34.31]I think you should come home
[02:35.93]And I don't want you to
[02:37.24]Go
[02:37.57]I don't really wanna
[02:38.69]Fight
[02:39.02]'Cause nobody's gonna
[02:40.32]Win
[02:40.78]I think you should come home
[02:42.31]And I don't want you to
[02:43.58]Go
[02:43.96]I don't really wanna
[02:45.20]Fight
[02:45.50]'Cause nobody's gonna
[02:46.75]Win
[02:46.98]I just thought you should know
[02:48.83]And I'll never let you
[02:49.93]Go
[02:50.32]'Cause I know this is a
[02:51.56]Fight
[02:51.90]That someday we're gonna
[02:53.12]Win
[02:56.67]It's you and me that's my whole world
[02:59.33]They whisper in the hallway "She's a bad bad girl"
[03:05.55]Oh I just thought you should know
[03:08.34]You should know
[03:09.35]It's you and me there's nothing like this
[03:12.35]Miss Americana and the Heartbreak Prince
[03:15.25]Okay
[03:15.80]We're so sad we paint the town blue
[03:18.77]Voted most likely to run away with you
[03:20.78]And I don't want you to
[03:22.09]Go
[03:22.37]I don't really wanna
[03:23.55]Fight
[03:23.87]'Cause nobody's gonna
[03:25.12]Win
[03:25.43]I think you should come home
[03:27.14]And I'll never let you
[03:28.40]Go
[03:28.73]'Cause I know this is a
[03:29.98]Fight
[03:30.38]That someday we're gonna
[03:31.51]Win
[03:31.92]I just thought you should know
[03:35.19]You and me

[03:37.71]They whisper in the hallway "She's a bad bad girl"
[03:42.35]She's a bad bad girl
data.trans:
[ti:Miss Americana]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Lover]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.03]//
[00:08.07]//
[00:12.11]你知道我喜欢你 我为你痴狂
[00:15.58]比我十六岁时沉迷电影剧情还要痴狂
[00:18.72]返校节女王们挥着手 乐队奏着激昂的音乐 
[00:21.72]耀眼灯光让我茫然失措
[00:25.01]美国佳人的荣光在我面前悄然暗淡
[00:28.11]现在我感到绝望 撕碎了我的舞会礼服
[00:31.60]穿越荆棘遍布的玫瑰丛
[00:33.15]我看见了记分牌 全力奔跑
[00:37.20]//
[00:39.34]没有相机能拍下我做作的笑容
[00:42.51]我心怀期待 一心向前
[00:45.77]希望能在终点见到你
[00:49.40]这段时间漫长无比 但是
[00:51.83]只要我们在一起 我的世界便完美无憾
[00:54.52]他们在大厅里窃窃私语 她是个坏女孩
[00:57.60]//
[00:58.25]整个校园的人都那么虚伪
[01:00.89]耍弄愚蠢的把戏 就得做好自食其果的准备
[01:04.55]你我之间的故事 独一无二
[01:07.55]美国小姐和忧郁王子
[01:10.33]//
[01:10.98]我们的悲伤感染了整座城市
[01:13.94]很可能我会当选为与你远走高飞的人
[01:19.61]我的团队要输了 深受重创 伤痕累累
[01:22.78]我看到坏人在击掌
[01:25.99]我垂头丧气地离去
[01:27.54]你是唯一一个在意我的人
[01:32.28]美国梦在我眼前支离破碎
[01:35.56]我感到好无助 少女们都灰头土脸
[01:38.60]男孩总是很幼稚 那么 睿智的人在哪里
[01:41.87]亲爱的 我好害怕
[01:44.31]//
[01:46.55]没有相机能记录我悲伤的呜咽
[01:49.75]我心怀期待 一心向前
[01:52.95]希望能在终点见到你
[01:56.60]风暴即将来临 但是
[01:59.03]只要我们在一起 我的世界便完美无憾
[02:01.68]他们在大厅里窃窃私语 她是个坏女孩
[02:04.77]//
[02:05.33]整个校园的人都那么虚伪
[02:08.13]耍弄愚蠢的把戏 就得做好自食其果的准备
[02:11.83]你我之间的故事 独一无二
[02:14.75]美国小姐和忧郁王子
[02:17.58]//
[02:18.20]我们的悲伤感染了整座城市
[02:21.19]很可能我会当选为与你远走高飞的人
[02:29.59]我不想让你
[02:30.84]走
[02:31.20]我真的不想
[02:32.44]争斗
[02:32.71]因为这场争斗不会有
[02:33.96]赢家
[02:34.31]我觉得你应该回来
[02:35.93]我不想让你
[02:37.24]走
[02:37.57]我真的不想
[02:38.69]争斗
[02:39.02]因为这场争斗不会有
[02:40.32]赢家

[02:43.96]我真的不想
[02:45.20]争斗
[02:45.50]因为这场争斗不会有
[02:46.75]赢家
[02:46.98]我觉得你应该明白
[02:48.83]我绝不会让你
[02:49.93]走
[02:50.32]因为我知道这是一场
[02:51.56]战斗

[02:53.12]胜利
